CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Commodities Group relative to Port of Silverhaven?
SRP.A: Stellar Commodities Group is {above} Port of Silverhaven in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Port of Silverhaven relative to Stellar Commodities Group?
SRP.A: Port of Silverhaven is {below} Stellar Commodities Group in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total agricultural exports?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Port of Silverhaven}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total agricultural exports?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Stellar Commodities Group}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Commodities Group's maximum Agricultural Exports in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Commodities Group's maximum Agricultural Exports is in {1980}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Port of Silverhaven's minimum Agricultural Exports in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Port of Silverhaven's minimum Agricultural Exports is in {1990}.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1987, did the total Agricultural Exports experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total agricultural exports between 1980 and 1987 was {larger} than between 1980 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1989, did the total Agricultural Exports experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total agricultural exports between 1986 and 1989 was {larger} than between 1987 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1984, did the total Agricultural Exports experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total agricultural exports between 1981 and 1984 was {smaller} than between 1982 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1989, did the total Agricultural Exports experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total agricultural exports between 1988 and 1989 was {smaller} than between 1981 and 1990.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Port of Silverhaven} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Commodities Group and Port of Silverhaven first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Commodities Group and Port of Silverhaven first exchanged leading positions in {1981}.
